name: llm-proxy
description: Build a lightweight local service that provides a unified interface for client calls, centrally encrypts and manages multi-platform API keys, tracks API prices and remaining quotas. Automatically selects the optimal API based on cost/quota priority strategies, supports format conversion to adapt to different vendors. Includes a local Web interface for visual management of resources and call statistics. Only stores data locally, lightweight, secure, and easy to configure.

scripts.copy-configs: cp -r configs dist/ 2>/dev/null || robocopy configs dist\configs /e /nfl /ndl /njh /njs /nc /ns /np 2>nul || true
scripts.tauri:dev: npm run build && npm run copy-to-tauri && npx @tauri-apps/cli dev
scripts.tauri:build: npm run build && npm run copy-to-tauri && npx @tauri-apps/cli build
scripts.tauri:build:debug: npm run build && npm run copy-to-tauri && npx @tauri-apps/cli build --debug
scripts.copy-to-tauri: npm run copy-dist-to-tauri && npm run copy-configs-to-tauri && npm run copy-package-to-tauri && npm run install-tauri-deps
scripts.copy-dist-to-tauri: cp -r dist/* src-tauri/ 2>/dev/null || robocopy dist src-tauri /e /nfl /ndl /njh /njs /nc /ns /np 2>nul || true
scripts.copy-configs-to-tauri: cp -r configs src-tauri/ 2>/dev/null || robocopy configs src-tauri\configs /e /nfl /ndl /njh /njs /nc /ns /np 2>nul || true
scripts.copy-package-to-tauri: cp package.json src-tauri/ 2>/dev/null || copy package.json src-tauri\ 2>nul || true
scripts.build:all-platforms: npm run tauri:build -- --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --target x86_64-apple-darwin --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

author: caoergou
